Package backend.logic

package backend.logic
  • Klassen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    AnomalyDetectionService
    Service class for managing and detecting anomalies in invoice data.
    ExportService
    The ExportService class provides functionality to export reimbursement data in the formats JSON, XML, PDF, and CSV.
    ExportService.AccountingEntry
     
    ExportService.AccountingWrapper
     
    ExportService.ExportData
    Data transfer object for exporting user reimbursement information.
    FlaggedUserService
    The FlaggedUserService class provides functionality to manage and query users who have been flagged for suspicious activity or violations in the system.
    InvoiceService
    Service class for managing invoices associated with users.
    LocalDateAdapter
    Adapter class for converting between LocalDate and String during XML marshalling and unmarshalling.
    NotificationService
    Service class for managing notifications within the system.
    OCRService
    Service class for performing Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on PDF and image files.
    ReimbursementService
    The ReimbursementService class provides core business logic for managing reimbursement operations within the Lunchify application.
    SearchService
     
    SessionManager
    Manages the current user session in the application.
    StatisticsService
    Service class for generating statistical reports and analytics about reimbursements.
    UserService
    Service class for managing user-related operations including authentication, retrieval, and modification of user data.
